verses.translation: By the fig and the olive

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Laqad khalaqna al-insana fi ahsani taqwim
verses.translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature
Then We return him to the lowest of the low

verses.arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.transliteration: Illa alladhina amanu wa 'amilu as-salihati falahum ajrun ghayru mamnun
verses.translation: Except those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted
So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
Is not Allah the most just of judges?
